content.html: I feel like any discourse that begins with “just abandon x state” is literally conceding territory we should make the fascists bleed for. Like why abandon whole states and the people in them to fucking fascists? That just emboldens them and costs us people. Put simply:
content.value:
I feel like any discourse that begins with “just abandon x state” is literally conceding territory we should make the fascists bleed for.

Like why abandon whole states and the people in them to fucking fascists? That just emboldens them and costs us people. 

Put simply:
